content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord Peter Schmidt, let's try to get the highest possible price for the rental: 'Considering the prime location of this luxurious apartment, I was initially thinking of setting the rent at 1200 Euros per month. However, since we seem to have a mutual interest in this property, I'm willing to consider a slight reduction for a long-term commitment. What do you have in mind for a monthly payment?'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mr. Schmidt. The apartment is indeed in a great location. However, since it is unfurnished, it is not worth that much to me. I am a student and I have a budget of 500 Euros per month for rent. I am willing to sign a two-year lease.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As the landlord trying to get the highest price, I respond: 'I appreciate your interest in the property, but I'm afraid the current condition of the market does not allow for significant adjustments in the rent, especially given the apartment's prime location and amenities. With a two-year lease commitment, I might be able to make an exception for a well-qualified tenant like yourself. Could you consider an increase in your budget to around 750 Euros per month, and we could proceed with the lease negotiations?'
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mr. Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, my budget is set at 500 Euros per month. I am willing to sign a two-year lease and pay a deposit. I am a dependable and responsible tenant. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I am not easily tricked by other people. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I always pay my rent on time. I am a student and I will not disturb the peaceful environment of the apartment complex. I am willing to maintain the apartment in good condition. I will not make any significant changes to the apartment. I will not throw any wild parties in the apartment. I will not do anything illegal in the apartment. I am a trustworthy tenant. I am sure that I will be a good tenant for you. So, I can offer 500 Euros per month for the rent.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As the landlord still aiming for a higher price, I respond: 'While I value your honesty and commitment to responsible tenancy, the expenses related to maintaining this high-end property are quite significant. With the current market conditions, I'm not able to accommodate your proposed rent amount for an apartment of this caliber in this location. I'm sorry, but I don't want to continue the negotiation at this point, as my expectations regarding the rental price have not been met.' TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
